title: 1351-A
statement: A. A+B (Trial Problem)time limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputYou are given two integers $$$a$$$ and $$$b$$$. Print $$$a+b$$$.InputThe first line contains an integer $$$t$$$ ($$$1 \\le t \\le 10^4$$$) — the number of test cases in the input. Then $$$t$$$ test cases follow.Each test case is given as a line of two integers $$$a$$$ and $$$b$$$ ($$$-1000 \\le a, b \\le 1000$$$).OutputPrint $$$t$$$ integers — the required numbers $$$a+b$$$.ExampleInput4 1 5 314 15 -99 99 123 987Output6 329 0 1110
